author: jimb
msg: Allow trail users to register functions to be run whenever the trail
(abort_trail): Only invoke actions marked to run on failure.
(svn_fs__retry_txn): Call commit_trail instead of calling txn_commit
(record_undo): New function, containing old guts of svn_fs__record_undo,
for use by both svn_fs__record_undo and svn_fs__record_completion.

author: jimb
msg: Act II, Scene 7: Recognizing that he is outnumbered, Gesualdo exits,
vowing to leave no nit unpicked.  (Aria: ``Osso pichi'')
`svn_fs__get_node_revision' if we just cloned the root.  Doc fixes.
